amendment.description: Manager's amendment increased FY08 funding to the Coast Guard to $8.4 billion; increased the authorized number of Coast Guard personnel by 1,500 members, to 47,000; increased maritime security response teams and made various and sundry changes throughout the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 110-604 and offered as a manager's amendment to make sundry changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Oberstar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
